name: Qlippoth Magic
summary: You've deeply studied the secrets of your blood and can force reality to act against its own wishes.
description:
You've deeply studied the secrets of your blood and can force reality to act against its own wishes. You can cast blur and silence once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
